scripts.copy-js: cp js/* dist && cp ./node_modules/slim-js/Slim.nomodule.js dist && cp ./node_modules/slim-js/directives/repeat.nomodule.js dist
scripts.concat-js: npx concat-cli -f dist/Slim.nomodule.js dist/repeat.nomodule.js dist/triangle-item.js dist/triangle-line.js dist/pascal-triangle.js -o dist/bundle_tmp.js
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run copy-js && npm run concat-js && npm run rollup && npm run minify-js
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && rm bundle_tmp.js && rm pascal-triangle.js && rm triangle-item.js && rm triangle-line.js && rm repeat.nomodule.js && rm Slim.nomodule.js
